channel.title: Script for Mafiadeath
channel.description:
This is kinda a Request/Help Thread.
Okay well i havnt been active on these forums in a long time! why? because i thought Jagex was dickheads and stopped playing Runescape. (also because i used Nexus)
But in the time ive been inactive i have been playing a game Called Mafiadeath (Mafiadeath.com).
I want to Create a Script that will Cheat the game, its a Text based game so i shouldnt be too hard, except for the captcha code once in a while.
[U][I][B]Home screen.[/B][/I][/U] [IMG]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg76/sean_htya/mafiadeathprofilehomescreen.jpg[/img]
[U][I][B]Gym Screen[/B][/I][/U] [IMG]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg76/sean_htya/mafiadeathgymscreen.jpg[/img] The amount you can train at the gym is worked out via the amount of energy you have (top right corner) the energy goes up every 10 mins or so.
[U][I][B]Crime Screen[/B][/I][/U] [IMG]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg76/sean_htya/mafiadeathcrimescreen.jpg[/img] the different crimes you can do is worked out by the amound of Nerve you have (top right of screen) and it goes up in time.
These are the 3 main screens.
other screens include:
[U][I][B]Cime Fail screen[/B][/I][/U] [IMG]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg76/sean_htya/mafiadeathcrimefailscreen.jpg[/img] This screen shows when you do a crime and its unsucessful, you an either retry the crime (if you have enough Nerve) or go back and try a different crime.
[B][I][U]mafiadeath.com[/U][/I][/B] [IMG]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg76/sean_htya/mafiadeathhomepage.jpg[/img] This is the first screen you see on Mafiadeath.com. Script would need to click on either 3 of the different servers to login.
[U][I][B]Loginpage[/B][/I][/U] [IMG]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg76/sean_htya/mafiadeathloginpage.jpg[/img] This is the login page you get to after clicking on one of the 3 servers. Script would need to put in login name and password, aswell as the Captcha Code..
(the Captcha Code doesnt move and always looks the same apart from different numbers :P
This is kinda a Request/Help Thread.
Okay well i havnt been active on these forums in a long time! why? because i thought Jagex was dickheads and stopped playing Runescape. (also because i used Nexus)
But in the time ive been inactive i have been playing a game Called Mafiadeath (Mafiadeath.com).
I want to Create a Script that will Cheat the game, its a Text based game so i shouldnt be too hard, except for the captcha code once in a while.
[U][I][B]Home screen.[/B][/I][/U] [IMG]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg76/sean_htya/mafiadeathprofilehomescreen.jpg[/img]
[U][I][B]Gym Screen[/B][/I][/U] [IMG]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg76/sean_htya/mafiadeathgymscreen.jpg[/img] The amount you can train at the gym is worked out via the amount of energy you have (top right corner) the energy goes up every 10 mins or so.
[U][I][B]Crime Screen[/B][/I][/U] [IMG]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg76/sean_htya/mafiadeathcrimescreen.jpg[/img] the different crimes you can do is worked out by the amound of Nerve you have (top right of screen) and it goes up in time.
These are the 3 main screens.
other screens include:
[U][I][B]Cime Fail screen[/B][/I][/U] [IMG]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg76/sean_htya/mafiadeathcrimefailscreen.jpg[/img] This screen shows when you do a crime and its unsucessful, you an either retry the crime (if you have enough Nerve) or go back and try a different crime.
[B][I][U]mafiadeath.com[/U][/I][/B] [IMG]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg76/sean_htya/mafiadeathhomepage.jpg[/img] This is the first screen you see on Mafiadeath.com. Script would need to click on either 3 of the different servers to login.
[U][I][B]Loginpage[/B][/I][/U] [IMG]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg76/sean_htya/mafiadeathloginpage.jpg[/img] This is the login page you get to after clicking on one of the 3 servers. Script would need to put in login name and password, aswell as the Captcha Code..
(the Captcha Code doesnt move and always looks the same apart from different numbers :P
...............ALSO................... Ive got the script to move to one of the bars when it needs too. [IMG]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg76/sean_htya/bars.jpg[/img]
but is it possible make the script see how much energy etc ive got like some:
if number 10< then? lol
basically i want it to train my player when my person has enough energy etc.

item.title: Script for Mafiadeath
item.dc:creator: @baleo baleo
item.description:
@baleo wrote:

Hi I’m interested in …ALSO…
Ive got the script to move to one of the bars when it needs too

Can you provide me in this.

Thanx U in advance

Leo

Read full topic

item.title: Script for Mafiadeath
item.dc:creator: @hello_to_you_all hello to you all
item.description:
@hello_to_you_all wrote:

This is kinda a Request/Help Thread.

Okay well i havnt been active on these forums in a long time! why? because i thought Jagex was dickheads and stopped playing Runescape. (also because i used Nexus)

But in the time ive been inactive i have been playing a game Called Mafiadeath (Mafiadeath.com).

I want to Create a Script that will Cheat the game, its a Text based game so i shouldnt be too hard, except for the captcha code once in a while.

Home screen.

mafiadeathprofilehomescreen.jpg802×617

Gym Screen

mafiadeathgymscreen.jpg791×590

The amount you can train at the gym is worked out via the amount of energy you have (top right corner) the energy goes up every 10 mins or so.

Crime Screen

mafiadeathcrimescreen.jpg784×592

the different crimes you can do is worked out by the amound of Nerve you have (top right of screen) and it goes up in time.

These are the 3 main screens.

other screens include:

Cime Fail screen

mafiadeathcrimefailscreen.jpg822×315

This screen shows when you do a crime and its unsucessful, you an either retry the crime (if you have enough Nerve) or go back and try a different crime.

mafiadeath.com

mafiadeathhomepage.jpg840×621

This is the first screen you see on Mafiadeath.com.
Script would need to click on either 3 of the different servers to login.

Loginpage

mafiadeathloginpage.jpg837×468

This is the login page you get to after clicking on one of the 3 servers.
Script would need to put in login name and password, aswell as the Captcha Code…

(the Captcha Code doesnt move and always looks the same apart from different numbers

mafiadeathhomepage.jpg840×621

Script would need to click on either 3 of the different servers to login.

Loginpage

mafiadeathloginpage.jpg837×468

Script would need to put in login name and password, aswell as the Captcha Code…

(the Captcha Code doesnt move and always looks the same apart from different numbers

…ALSO…
Ive got the script to move to one of the bars when it needs too.

but is it possible make the script see how much energy etc ive got like some:

if number 10< then? lol

basically i want it to train my player when my person has enough energy etc.

Read full topic
